#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long lld;
typedef long long unsigned llu;
lld mod=1e9+7;

#define    vl     vector<lld > 
#define    vi     vector<int >
#define    vv     vector<vl  >
#define    pl     pair<lld,lld >
#define    pp     pair<int,int >
#define  sc(a)    scanf("%lld",&a)
#define sc2(a,b)  scanf("%lld%lld",&a,&b)
#define  pr(a)    printf("%lld\n",a);
#define  all(x)   x.begin(),x.end()

struct compare            //----changing MAX-HEAP to MIN---//
 {  
   bool operator()(const lld& l, const lld& r)  
   {  
       return l > r;  
   }  
 };    

int main()
{
    lld n,m,x;
    cin>>n>>m;
    
    priority_queue<lld > p;   //--for max
    for(lld i=0;i<n;i++)
    {   priority_queue<lld,vector<lld >, compare > pq;  

        for(lld j=0;j<m;j++)
         {
           cin>>x;
           pq.push(x);  

        }
        //cout<<pq.top()<<"--\n";
       p.push(pq.top());
    }
    

   cout<<p.top()<<"\n";
}
